name: 陳盈君
objective:
特徵值、特徵向量及特徵函數，向量分析、向量微積分、傅立葉級數與邊界值問題、偏微分方程、複變函數。
Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.
schedule:
W01 Brief course introduction
W02 Break
W03 Ch7.1-7.3
W04 Ch7.4.7.8
W05 Ch8
W06 Quiz I
W07 Break
W08 Ch8
W09 Midterm
W10 Ch 11
W11 Ch 11
W12 Ch 12
W13 Ch 12
W14 Quiz II
W15 Ch 9
W16 Ch 9
W17 Ch 10
W18 Final term
scorePolicy: 期中考 (30%)，期末考 (30%)，平時成績 (小考與出席 40%)
consultation: Please email me to arrange the appointment. Office hour:Mon. 10.10-12.10Tue. 08.30-10.30 如需諮詢，請先來信預約時間。諮詢時間週一 10.10-12.10 週二 08.30-10.30
remarks: 課程進度會依實際狀況而有所更動。請加入 google classroom 以取得課程相關訊息:https://classroom.google.com/c/NTA5MTEwMjQ2NjAw?cjc=pwyrvpt
